item.title: JWT has identified 100 trends for the year 2015
item.description: Source: JWT website. The renowned marketing communications company, JWT, has unveiled “The Future 100,” a report that offers unique perspectives and analyses of 100 significant trends and cultural shifts to monitor in the coming year. Lucie Greene, JWTIntelligence’s Worldwide Director, emphasizes the importance of understanding the direction and implications of change for brands today. She points out that the rapid evolution of the digital world, readily available information, globalization, and social media have significantly accelerated the pace of trends.
